mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into country (Name, Continent, Region, SurfaceArea, IndepYear, Population, LifeExpectancy, GNP, GNPOld, LocalName, GovernmentForm, HeadOfState, Capital, Code2) values (#{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{continent,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{surfacearea,jdbcType=REAL}, #{indepyear,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{population,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lifeexpectancy,jdbcType=REAL}, #{gnp,jdbcType=REAL}, #{gnpold,jdbcType=REAL}, #{localname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{governmentform,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{headofstate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{capital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code2,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update country set Name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, Continent = #{continent,jdbcType=CHAR}, Region = #{region,jdbcType=CHAR}, SurfaceArea = #{surfacearea,jdbcType=REAL}, IndepYear = #{indepyear,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Population = #{population,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LifeExpectancy = #{lifeexpectancy,jdbcType=REAL}, GNP = #{gnp,jdbcType=REAL}, GNPOld = #{gnpold,jdbcType=REAL}, LocalName = #{localname,jdbcType=CHAR}, GovernmentForm = #{governmentform,jdbcType=CHAR}, HeadOfState = #{headofstate,jdbcType=CHAR}, Capital = #{capital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Code2 = #{code2,jdbcType=CHAR} where Code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select Code, Name, Continent, Region, SurfaceArea, IndepYear, Population, LifeExpectancy, GNP, GNPOld, LocalName, GovernmentForm, HeadOfState, Capital, Code2 from country where Code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}
select Code, Name, Continent, Region, SurfaceArea, IndepYear, Population, LifeExpectancy, GNP, GNPOld, LocalName, GovernmentForm, HeadOfState, Capital, Code2 from country
